pages.text: A veratile tool with many uses. It can shear many sheep at once, as well as harvest moss in a large radius.$(br2)Primarily used to obtain rare objects from specific blocks & drops from Fey equivalents of entities in our world.$(br2)$(info) It can be repaired with $(l:resources/runestone)runestone$(). You can see a complete list of uses in $(uses:roots:runic_shears)JEI$().
